CustomField.inlineHelpText: Capacity indicates how much a constituent might be able to donate. •AAAA - $100M +, • AAA - $50M - $99.9M, •AA - $25M - $49.9M •A - $10M - $24.9M, •B - $5M - $9.9M, •C - $1M - $4.9M •D - $500K - $999.9K, •E - $100K - $499.9K, •F - $25K – 99.9K Capacity is synced across the account and all of its related contacts. Please make all edits to Capacity on the Primary Contact's record.
CustomField.label: Capacity
